title: Build & Fund
subtitle: Define Your Target List & Purchase AI Credits
description: Use our intuitive filters to build a precise mailing list from our 140M+ property database or upload your own. Then, purchase a flexible package of AI Credits to power your campaign.
label: Step 1: Build Audience

title: Personalize & Deploy
subtitle: AI Crafts Your Campaign for In-House Fulfillment
description: Use AI Credits to generate hyper-personalized copy for each mailer. Once approved, our proprietary network handles the printing and mailing at a simple, flat rate per piece.

title: Engage & Qualify

description: When a homeowner responds via the unique tracking number or URL, our AI uses credits to engage them in a natural conversation, qualifying their intent, timeline, and property condition.
label: Step 3: AI Qualifies Responses

title: Receive Qualified Leads

description: Fully-qualified, motivated sellers are either hot-transferred to your sales team for a live conversation or automatically booked as appointments directly on your calendar. Your pipeline fills with high-intent leads.
label: Step 4: Book or Transfer
